Package pizzapizza

Class DataModel

java.lang.Object
pizzapizza.DataModel
public class DataModel extends Object
The DataModel class represents a singleton data model for managing pizza orders and stored orders.
Author:
Sibi suriyanarayan Tiruchirapalli venketaramani, Rahulraj Rajesh
